title: Exclusive: Pixel will be able to stream Android apps to your Chromebook/PC, here’s how it works [Video]
content:
Google has been preparing a way to stream apps and notifications from your Pixel phone to your Chromebook or PC, and 9to5Google has enabled this feature to provide an exclusive first look at it.

more…

The post Exclusive: Pixel will be able to stream Android apps to your Chromebook/PC, here’s how it works [Video] appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: Google has been preparing to stream apps & notifications from your Pixel phone to your Chromebook or PC. Here's an exclusive first look.
